trans-unit.source: Represents a key identifier clause that identifies a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref> security token using the X.509 certificate's subject key identifier extension.
trans-unit.target: 表示金鑰識別碼子句可識別<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref>安全性權杖使用 X.509 憑證之主體金鑰識別碼延伸。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause 不需要使用，除了在建立自訂安全性權杖服務時。

trans-unit.source: When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 當安全性權杖服務傳回安全性權杖時，所發出的安全性權杖會包含已附加及未附加之安全性權杖的參考。

trans-unit.source: Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references are security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 附加的參考參考都包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭內的安全性權杖，而未附加的參考是指不包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 這些參考通常會證明這些發出的安全性權杖的真實性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause> class to reference a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token using the X.509 certificate's subject key identifier extension.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>類別，即可參考<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>安全性權杖使用 X.509 憑證之主體金鑰識別碼延伸。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause.GetX509SubjectKeyIdentifier%2A> method returns the subject key identifier extension.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause.GetX509SubjectKeyIdentifier%2A>方法會傳回主體金鑰識別碼延伸。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause.GetX509SubjectKeyIdentifier%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] supports the following types of security token references for <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)]支援下列類型的安全性權杖參考<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>安全性權杖。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> - X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>-X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause></xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class using the specified subject key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>類別使用指定的主體金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the subject key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>，其中包含主體金鑰識別碼。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: ski is .
trans-unit.target: skiis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a key identifier clause can be created for the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以針對指定的 X.509 憑證建立金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: A key identifier clause can be created when the `certificate` parameter contains the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension> extension.
trans-unit.target: 可建立時的金鑰識別碼子句`certificate`參數包含<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension>延伸模組。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> ，其中包含 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: if a key identifier clause can be created for certificate; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果可以建立金鑰識別碼子句 certificate ，否則 。

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the subject key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得主體金鑰識別項。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the subject key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Byte>，其中包含主體金鑰識別碼。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the key identifier of the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體的金鑰識別碼是否等於指定的 X.509 憑證的金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The Matches method compares the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension> extension for the two X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 比對方法會比較<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension>兩個 X.509 憑證的擴充功能。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> that contains the X.509 certificate to compare.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> ，其中包含要比較的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: if certificate has the same subject key identifier as the current instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 certificate 具有相同主體金鑰識別碼，於目前的執行個體; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns the subject key identifier.
trans-unit.target: ToString 方法會傳回主體金鑰識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，代表目前物件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Creates a key identifier clause using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 建立使用指定的 X.509 憑證的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause> key identifier clause can be created for the X.509 certificate when it contains a subject key identifier.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>包含主體金鑰識別碼時，可以為 X.509 憑證建立金鑰識別碼子句。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> to create the key identifier clause for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref>建立金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> that represents the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>表示金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when a key identifier clause can be created for the specified X.509 certificate; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>當建立金鑰識別碼子句，針對指定的 X.509 憑證;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .
